abstract: Asian stock markets decline as lack of solution to Greek debt crisis causes concern over consequences to global financial system.
lead_paragraph: News that Greece’s banks and stock market would be closed on Monday sent shares lower in Asia, mostly overshadowing effects of China’s rate cut on Saturday.

headline.main: Asia Markets Slide on Fears About Greece; China Extends Tumble
headline.print_headline: Asia Markets Slide on Fears Over Greece

snippet: News that Greece’s banks and stock market would be closed on Monday sent shares lower in Asia, mostly overshadowing effects of China’s rate cut on Saturday.

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
